item.title: Carson leads PGA
item.description: Brett Carson took a three stroke lead into the final round of the PGA Championship at Whistling Straits with a birdie on the final hole.
item.dc:subject: golf

item.title: Groveney Signs Deal
item.description: New York signed leading defenseman Steve Groveny to a 2-year contract on Thursday.
item.dc:subject: NHL

item.title: Olson Out for Two Weeks
item.description: Kansas City QB Drew Olson will miss two weeks of practice due to a sprained knee, team officials announced this morning.
item.dc:subject: NFL

item.title: Soccer Season Delayed
item.description: The start of Spain's soccer season will be delayed for two weeks because of financial problems and fallout from a league-wide drug scandal.
item.dc:subject: soccer

item.title: Gregg Called Up
item.description: Steve Gregg was recalled to the majors after allowing two hits in six innings in his third start for Triple-A Akron.
item.dc:subject: MLB
